channel.title: Interviews on The Young KL Singers
channel.description: Recent content in Interviews on The Young KL Singers

item.title: Director's Notes: Interview with Ian
item.description: For “YKLS ROCKS!” director Ian Chow, this will be his fourth performance outing with the community choir,  ever since he first mustered enough courage to pick up the phone to book a slot for auditions back in 2002.

item.title: The Star Write Up!
item.description: The online version of The Star’s write-up on Illuminations is now available! With more photos!

item.title: BFM Interview With The Music Director!
item.description: Illuminating With Songs, Singing to Make Clearer: BFM interviews our music director Chi Hoe on what to expect for Illuminations! You can listen to the interview at BFM’s website here!
